heading: HB02941
0: AN ACT REQUIRING LICENSE AND CLEARANCE FROM PROFESSIONAL REGULATION COMMISSION FOR THE PRACTICE OF OPTOMETRY AND OPERATION OF OPTICAL SHOPS, RESPECTIVELY AND THE SAME TO BE STRICTLY ENFORCED BY THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNIT CONCERNED AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
